text: Robot King Sunshark (로보트왕 썬샤크, Roboteu-wang Sseon-syakeu) also known as Solar Adventure is 1985 an animated and Anti-communism film from South Korea. directed by Park Seung-Cheol. == Characters == * Republic of Korea Reserve Forces (대한민국 예비군) * Agnes (아그네스) * Iria (이리아) * General Dangling Lump (혹부리 수령, aka Kim Il-sung) * Spector (스펙터) Category:Animation Category:Animated movies
title: Robot King Sunshark
